plot: Nonoka and her father return to Lake Kiriya City after years in Tokyo, and discover a strange, hovering disk hangs over the city. Before the family moved, Nonoka's mother was alive but she and her father are returning without her. Nonoka also meets the equally mysterious girl Noel, who seems somehow tied to the disk and promises to grant the grieving Nonoka's wishes.
ending_theme: "Hoshikuzu no Interlude" (星屑のインターリュード) by fhana
"Hoshikuzu no Interlude (星屑のインターリュード)" by fhána (eps 1-6, 8-10, 12-13)
"Hoshi no Kakera (ホシノカケラ)" by fhána (ep 7)
"Sora no Method ~Quote from Stardust Interlude~ (天体のメソッド~Quote from Stardust Interlude~)" by fhána (ep 11)
